TSOPPI: TSO500 Post-Processing for InPreD
=========================================

'TSOPPI' is a collection of tools for post-processing of data generated by Illumina's TSO500 LocalApp pipeline. Packaged in a Docker/Singularity container, the aim of the software is to annotate, integrate and visualize the somatic variant calling results produced by the primary LocalApp analysis.

Please refer to the documentation pages of individual tools for details regarding their functionality and usage.
